name: Rummy Robots
description:
Rummy Robots its a 2-4 player Couch Competitive Free-For-Fall King of the Hill Brawler featuring robotic pirates on a ship fighting for the role of captain. 

Players gain points by standing in a zone which will be moved around the map randomly. Only one player may receive points at any given time, you can also fight other players by knocking them overboard!

This game was created during a final year assessment during my first year of study with a team of 6 people over a two month period.

Designers

Jordan Dines

Callum Stirrup-Prazak

Artists

Myles Foote

Christopher Bowen

Programmers

Rouie Ortega

Gene Collis
